items.title: STAFF PICKS: #9 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Stanford Cardinal
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish have slowly climbed back up the rankings, and are now ranked #9 in the country in the college football playoff rankings after an absolute BANGER against Syracuse. Next up for the Irish is the Stanford Cardinal for the Legends Trophy, top nerdom, and a berth in the college football playoff. […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Stanford Cardinal Q&A with Channel Tree Sports
items.summary: Alrighty folks, we’ve finally made it to the regular season finale of the college football season for our Notre Dame Fighting Irish. With a 9-2 record, a #9 ranking in the College Football Playoff rankings, and plenty of fun discussions happening on who deserves the at-large spots this year, it’s imperative that Marcus Freeman and […]

items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame is locked in on ALL of the playoff stuff
items.summary: Joshua, Jude, and Brendan unlock the safe to the pod machine to bring you the best Notre Dame football show. In this episode: And plenty more weaved in and out of the show.  Please RATE and REVIEW! All reviews left on Apple Podcasts will be read on the next Earned 5-Star Podcast. Go Irish!

items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Stanford Cardinal
items.summary: There is a lot on the line this weekend as the Notre Dame Fighting Irish travel to the farm in Palo Alto to take on the Stanford Cardinal. Nevermind Stanford’s record or the fact the Irish are almost a five touchdown favorite – the pressure is still there. What’s on the line? The Legends Trophy […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Hot and Cold Takes VS The Stanford Cardinal
items.summary: How’d We Do Last Week? Most Wildly Inaccurate Im not sure there has ever been less of a sleepwalk first half for the Irish.
